      • actualizeAncestorPlannedValuesOrExpenses

        public static void actualizeAncestorPlannedValuesOrExpenses(java.lang.Integer workItemID,
                                            java.lang.Integer parentID,
                                            int computedValueType,
                                            java.lang.Integer personID,
                                            java.lang.Double hoursPerWorkingDay)
        Once a planned value was changed on a leaf workItem or a new leaf workItem was created or copied or the parent was changed the ancestor planned values should be actualized
        Parameters:
        parentID -
        hoursPerWorkingDay -
        forceRecompute - cover the case then the plan/expense was set form a non null value to null (the ancestors contain the previous non-null values in their sum) FIXME it should be synchronized but performance is also important

      • getSumOfDescendantBudgetOrPlanOrExpense

        public static ComputedValueBL.ValueAndTimeUnitBean getSumOfDescendantBudgetOrPlanOrExpense(java.lang.Integer workItemID,
                                                                           int effortType,
                                                                           int computedValueType,
                                                                           java.lang.Integer personID,
                                                                           java.lang.Double hoursPerWorkingDay)
        Gets the sum of descendants' budget/plan/expense. If the last child of the workItemID was just removed (is is leaf now) then return null signaling that the computed value (calculated from descendants) should be changed with the last value from the budget history (if any, otherwise the computed value should be deleted) Sum up the nearest descendant with computedValuesBean found (do not search in children of the nearest descendant, we suppose that the budget/plan value conforms in their children) if computedValueType is PLAN probably only the direct children are summed up (planned values are calculated), if computedValueType is BUDGET it could be more deep (budgets are not necessarily specified at each level)
        Parameters:
        workItemID -
        effortType -
        computedValueType -
        hoursPerWorkingDay -
        Returns:

      • computeBottomUpValues

        public static ComputedValueBL.ValueAndTimeUnitBean computeBottomUpValues(TWorkItemBean workItemBean,
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> parentToChildrenMap,
                                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TWorkItemBean> workItemBeansMap,
                                                         int effortType,
                                                         int computedValueType,

        Compute the bottom up dates recursively starting from top parents
        Parameters:

        parentToChildrenMap -
        workItemBeansMap -
        startDate -
        Returns:
